result.eng: We have to celebrate your birthday!
result.ga: caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradh
result.orig: caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradh
result.html: caithfidh muid do bhreithlá a cheiliúradhWe have to celebrate your birthday!
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ muid do ḃreiṫlá a ċeiliúraḋWe have to celebrate your birthday!

result.eng: We will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
result.ga: ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradh
result.orig: ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradh
result.html: ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradhWe will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃeiḋ muid in ann a lá breiṫe a ċeiliúraḋWe will not be able to celebrate her birthday.
